name: General powers and duties
text:
[§431:19-101.7]  General powers and duties.  The administrator shall:
     (1)  Have the authority expressly conferred upon the administrator by, or reasonably implied from, the provisions of this article; and
     (2)  Assist the commissioner in the enforcement of this article and rules adopted pursuant to this article and related to captive insurance. [L 1997, c 261, pt of §2]
